name: The Lost Maze
description:
A door opens and gives way to a large, dark and wet entry ... Enter if you dare!

The Lost Maze is a first person exploration game where you must pick up treasures and find the exit but be careful to traps and monsters !

You can choose to explore the game with a classic control such as other first person games or using the old-school controller which is close to old dungeon crawler games.

Update

The episode 2 is here with a tons of bug fixes and enhanced controls for Linux and Mac users !

Features

  • 2 episodes
  • 20 levels where you need to explore and fight
  • Two control modes (Normal and Old school)
  • RPG Combat system
  • Play with your Gamepad and/or your Mouse/Keyboard
  • French and English translations

Don't forget to take a look at the official page and the IndieDB page too !
